channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description: @Stv Always stay till the end.
I reached another milestone in my Chinese language studies. https://t.co/Dip3D723ka

@goodreads I can only listen to music without lyrics while reading. Otherwise it‚Äôs too distracting. The exception is when it‚Äôs a book *about* music, such as Dilla Time by @dancharnas, where I want to hear the artist‚Äôs music (and music adjacent to the artist) that‚Äôs the subject of the book.
@CBCNews What happened after that?

*Owen Wilson Wow* https://t.co/ktt70PjuyQ
I will not accept the nomination as leader of the United Conservative Party of Alberta, and will not serve if elected.
@domesticat Oh my goodness, LT did a Jeff Buckley (RIP) cover. (Also RIP J Dilla.)
@stephentweedale Same! I just ordered mine.

@domesticat Your recommendation got me intrigued, and Aaliyah‚Äôs (RIP) gushing put me over the top. And I‚Äôve been listening to a lot of ‚Äú‚Äú‚Äú‚Äúneo-soul‚Äù‚Äù‚Äù‚Äù lately thanks to reading a book about J Dilla. Starting from the beginning now.
@heyrickie I use it for movie nights with co-workers. Someone shares their screen, streams a movie, and we chat about it in the backchannel.
1-2-3 4th inning defensively for the Blue Jays. Shots are on me!

What a relief. https://t.co/ClouO9mGvd
Because I have honour, I‚Äôm moving off Google Workspace for my dormant sole proprietorship @e14t, the domain for which is purely for business purposes. I‚Äôll most likely be back if I need to rejuvenate it.
I‚Äôll use https://t.co/N9SJP9nVjC for free email forwarding for the business domain.
Now that I know to watch out for this, I keep wondering if an article I find in search engines is the original or a weird plagiarism with random words replaced with synonyms. https://t.co/vazlEnAbG7

I sometimes use ‚Äúlike‚Äù as punctuation, and in those cases, I‚Äôm trying to replace it with a pause instead. I‚Äôm keeping it when I need to drive home a point, though. https://t.co/F0NZ4s3r9R
https://t.co/SWY2iz7o43
I have everything I need to he productive today. https://t.co/vnk9D8Jdn6

Tonight. https://t.co/djlT4mK7w5
HYFR. https://t.co/VY9bu7YRRO
üé∂ ‚Äú¬°Yo no soy marinero!‚Äù üé∂ https://t.co/7Pwybt6ZVD
1-2-3 4th inning defensively for the Blue Jays. Shots on me!
My view from the cheap seats. https://t.co/RcGWt8uFF2
My view from the cheap seats. https://t.co/8fTjEnxoux
¬°Alejandro!
VAR is killing baseball.
Blue Jays win! https://t.co/uXkwZ8zEGj
The @BlueJays played this video on the jumbotron at the ballgame last night and it was almost as if they knew I‚Äôd be there to see it. https://t.co/ZeRCWLFdJB
@BlueJays First time since 2019?
@BlueJays Crying rn.
@BlueJays Yessssssss. https://t.co/sJcAv6GUrl
@syncros Yessssssss. https://t.co/MoxmFR5dgP
I can‚Äôt stop thinking about this scene. https://t.co/0vVepIPC4S

Today is a planned mental health day, and I hoped to go to Toronto Islands to have time slow down a bit. Rainy weather let me off the hook for the poor planning I did for that. Plan B was to get closer to a sense of being on top of things around my apartment, and so far so good.
I‚Äôm happy with what I got done around done around my apartment today. Thanks for asking!
This morning I went to a coffee shop (Coco‚Äôs in Little Italy) that sells giant chocolate chip cookies. It‚Äôs not quite as big as my head, though my mental health still did improve as a result of eating it. https://t.co/IewodRPQxH
I can‚Äôt believe I ate the whole thing! https://t.co/zBWCMDRfYE
I topped the day off with a baseball game. https://t.co/qqD4ibqVRY
I gotta say, today was a good day.
Sigh, I know. https://t.co/JWaNE3rpRc
Who else but Johnny Gaudreau?
What do whales think when there‚Äôs a total lunar eclipse? Are they like, ‚ÄúHey, where‚Äôd the moon go?‚Äù
@Celadon_kate Does she do the ‚ÄúI‚Äôm squishing your head!‚Äù thing?
